value.stringValue: eGFR >/= 30 to < 60mL/min (150 mg Nirmatrelvir AND 100 mg Ritonavir) PO twice daily x 5 days
A drug-drug interaction was identified by the patient but they are able to safely hold or modify the interacting medication(s) for the duration of therapy with Paxlovid.
A drug-drug interaction was identified by the patient and they are unable to proceed with Paxlovid.
eGFR >/= 60mL/min (300 mg Nirmatrelvir AND 100 mg Ritonavir) PO twice daily x 5 days
No drug-drug interactions were identified, and the patient is able to proceed with Paxlovid treatment as ordered.

assignments.description: Assign the input to the collection
assignments.name: VCC_T2T_Presciptions_Assign_Freetext
assignments.label: VCC_T2T_Presciptions_Assign Freetext

choices.name: vcc_No_Hypersensitivity_Choice
choices.choiceText: Patient does NOT have any known hypersensitivity to Nirmatrelvir or Ritonavir

choices.choiceText:
eGFR >/= 30 to < 60mL/min


    (150 mg Nirmatrelvir AND 100 mg Ritonavir) PO twice daily x 5 days

choices.name: VCC_T2T_Dosage_EGFR60plus
choices.choiceText:
eGFR >/= 60mL/min


     (300 mg Nirmatrelvir AND 100 mg Ritonavir) PO twice daily x 5 days

choices.choiceText: A drug-drug interaction was identified by the patient but they are able to safely hold or modify the interacting medication(s) for the duration of therapy with Paxlovid.

choices.name: VCC_T2T_Drug_Interaction_None_Choice
choices.choiceText: No drug-drug interactions were identified, and the patient is able to proceed with Paxlovid treatment as ordered.

choices.name: VCC_T2T_Drug_Interaction_Yes
choices.choiceText: A drug-drug interaction was identified by the patient and they are unable to proceed with Paxlovid.

choices.choiceText: A drug-drug interaction was identified by the patient and they are unable to proceed with Paxlovid.

choices.name: VCC_T2T_Drug_Interations
choices.choiceText: A drug-drug interaction was identified by the patient but they are able to safely hold or modify the interacting medication(s) for the duration of therapy with Paxlovid.

choices.description: Indicates that there are no know drug interactions from the medication list with the paxlovid treatment

decisions.description: This is used to check the radio options that were selected in the previous screen and where to proceed
decisions.name: VCC_Interaction_Drug_Decision
decisions.label: VCC_Interaction_Drug_Decision

formulas.description: CCCM-9888 ii.<< If 'Changes needed' or 'Other' is chosen for Medication Reconciliation Discrepancies field, then display and make required the Medication Discrepancy Additional Info field.>>
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Check_Medication_Discrepancy
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL ({!ProgressNoteRecord.VCC_Medication_Reconciliation_Options_Rn__c}, 'Changes needed') && ISBLANK({!VCC_T2T_Medication_Discrepancies_Additional_Info}), True, False) || IF(ISPICKVAL ({!ProgressNoteRecord.VCC_Medication_Reconciliation_Options_Rn__c}, 'Other') && ISBLANK({!VCC_T2T_Medication_Discrepancies_Additional_Info}), True, False)

formulas.description: This formula checks what was selected on this field and returns an error if the 'No, specify other reason' is selected for Medication Education
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Check_Medication_Education

formulas.description: Formula used to convert date variables into string for storage
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Convert_Date
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})), IF( {!VCC_T2T_Count} = 0, "VCC_T2T_Home_Test_Date: " + TEXT(MONTH({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})), "VCC_T2T_Symptom_Date: " + TEXT(MONTH({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!VCC_T2T_originalDate})) ), IF( {!VCC_T2T_Count} = 0, "VCC_T2T_Home_Test_Date: N/A", "VCC_T2T_Symptom_Date: N/A" ) )

formulas.description: Designed to be paired with JS to extract data only containing values on index
formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Data_Extract
formulas.expression: CASE({!VCC_T2T_Count}, 0, ({!patientInterestedInPaxlovid}), 1, IF({!paxConsentCheckbox}, "True", "False"), 2, IF({!paxCounseledCheckbox}, "True", "False"), 3,IF({!paxNotConsideredCheckbox}, "False", "True"), 4, ({!Would_you_like_to_consider_Molnupiravir}), 5, IF({!paxNotConsideredCheckbox}, "True", "False"), 6, IF({!paxNotConsideredCheckbox}, "False", "True"), 7, {!VCC_T2T_Allergy_Value}, 8, IF({!vcc_Hypersensitivity_Choice_Radio}, "True", "False"), 9, {!VCC_T2T_Medication_Value}, 10, TEXT({!ProgressNoteRecord.VCC_Medication_Reconciliation_Options__c}), 11, TEXT({!ProgressNoteRecord.VCC_Medication_Reconciliation_Options_Rn__c}), 12, {!VCC_T2T_Medication_Discrepancies_Additional_Info}, 13, IF({!VCC_Prescription_Review}, "True", "False"), 14, IF({!VCC_Prescription_Review}, "True", "False"), 15, ({!VCC_T2T_Drug_Interaction_Answer}), 16, TEXT({!ProgressNoteRecord.VCC_Medication_Education__c}), 17, {!VCC_T2T_Medication_Education_Additional_Info}, 18, {!VCC_T2T_Labs_Value}, 19, TEXT(MONTH({!VCC_T2T_Home_Test_Date})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!VCC_T2T_Home_Test_Date})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!VCC_T2T_Home_Test_Date})), 20, IF({!VCC_T2T_Criteria_Choice_Picklist}, "True", "False"), 21, TEXT(MONTH({!VCC_T2T_Symptom_Date})) + "-" + TEXT(DAY({!VCC_T2T_Symptom_Date})) + "-" + TEXT(YEAR({!VCC_T2T_Symptom_Date})), 22, ({!VCC_T2T_Symptom_Details_Long}), 23, IF({!VCC_T2T_Criteria_Choice_Picklist}, "True", "False"), 24, IF({!VCC_T2T_Criteria_Choice_Picklist}, "True", "False"), 25, ({!VCC_T2T_Dosage_Answer}), 26, IF({!PatientandorCaregiverConsentstoPaxlovidUseCheckBox}, "True", "False"), 27, IF({!patientenrolledinCOVID19followupTreatmentCheckBox}, "True","False"), 28, ({!Medication_adjustments_needed_as_follows}), 29, ({!Patient_is_denied_due_to_the_following}), 30, ({!Would_you_like_to_consider_Molnupiravir_disposition}), null )

formulas.name: VCC_T2T_Data_Label_String
formulas.expression: CASE({!VCC_T2T_Count}, 0, "Based on medical history and medications taken, is patient interested in Paxlovid treatment?", 1, {!paxConsentVar}, 2, {!paxPatientCounseledVar}, 3, {!paxLimitationOfEUA}, 4, "Would you like to consider Molnupiravir?", 5, {!paxNotConsidered}, 6, {!Paxlovid_Message}, 7, "Allergies", 8, "Hypersensitivity to Paxlovid", 9, "Prescriptions", 10, "Medication Reconcilliation", 11, "Medication Reconciliation Discrepancies", 12, "Medication Discrepancies Additional Info", 13, {!paxReviewCompleted_var}, 14, {!pax_Contraindications_var}, 15, "Select what applies", 16, "Medication Education", 17, "Medication Education Additional Info", 18, "Labs", 19, {!VCC_T2T_Test_Confirmed_Text}, 20, {!VCC_T2T_No_Hospitalization_Text}, 21, {!VCC_T2T_Symptom_Onset_Text}, 22, "Symptom Details", 23, {!VCC_T2T_Blurb_Medical_text}, 24, "Patient has met ALL of the above criteria", 25, "Select appropriate dosage", 26, {!pax_Patient_and_or_Caregiver_Consents_to_Paxlovid_Use_var}, 27, {!paxPatient_enrolled_in_followup_Covid19_Treatment_var}, 28, "Medication adjustments needed, as follows", 29, "Patient is denied due to the following", 30, "Would you like to consider Molnupiravir?", null )

Flow.interviewLabel: VCC COVID Test to Treat Subflow: Paxlovid {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} {!recordId}
Flow.label: VCC COVID Test to Treat Subflow: Paxlovid

fields.name: Patient_is_denied_due_to_the_following
fields.fieldText: Patient is denied due to the following

fields.name: VCC_T2T_Test_Confirmed_Text
fields.fieldText: • Patient has a Home Test -confirmed mild to moderate COVID-19.

fields.name: VCC_T2T_No_Hospitalization_Text
fields.fieldText: • Provider believes the patient does not require hospitalization due to severe or critical COVID-19.

fields.name: VCC_T2T_Symptom_Onset_Text
fields.fieldText: • Patient is within 5 days of symptom onset.

fields.name: VCC_T2T_Blurb_Medical_text
fields.fieldText:
• Patient does NOT have severe renal impairment (eGFR < 30 mL/min) OR severe hepatic impairment (Child-Pugh Class C) and has laboratory work completed within 6 month time period based on provider judgement. If Patient has a renal or hepatic diagnosis laboratory work completed within 30 days based on provider judgement.
  • Patient falls into high-risk for progression to severe disease (including hospitalization and death) as defined by the CDC People with Certain Medical Conditions - CDC)

Other medical conditions or factors (for example, race or ethnicity) may also place individual at high risk for progression to severe COVID-19 and authorization is not limited to the medical conditions or factors as defined by the CDC People with Certain Medical Conditions list.

fields.name: VCC_T2T_Criteria_Choice_Picklist
fields.fieldText: Patient has met ALL of the above criteria

fields.name: VCC_Display_Text_Choice
fields.fieldText: {!paxReviewCompleted_var} Lexicomp.

screens.name: Paxlovid_Patient_Allergies
screens.label: Paxlovid Patient Allergies

fields.name: Paxlovid_Message
fields.fieldText: Paxlovid is contraindicated in patients with a history of clinically significant hypersensitivity reactions (e.g., toxic epidermal necrolysis (TEN) or Stevens-Johnson syndrome) to its active ingredients (Nirmatrelvir or Ritonavir) or any other components of the product.

fields.name: vcc_Hypersensitivity_Choice_Radio
fields.fieldText: Populating this field from the Allergies sidebar component will overwrite the value of this field

screens.helpText: Populating this field from the Allergies side bar component will overwrite the value of this field

fields.name: patientInterestedInPaxlovid
fields.fieldText: Based on medical history and medications taken, is patient interested in Paxlovid treatment?

fields.name: paxConsentDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
{!paxConsentVar}


 FDA EUA Fact Sheet - Paxlovid

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_consider_Molnupiravir
fields.fieldText: Would you like to consider Molnupiravir?
